data.title: Belly Fat Burner
data.description: A quick and effective workout targeting belly fat. Perfect for beginners to kickstart their fitness journey and burn calories.

data.title: Lose Fat
data.description: An easy-to-follow fat-loss workout designed for beginners. Helps to burn calories and improve overall fitness.

data.title: Plank
data.description: A short but powerful core-strengthening workout. Perfect for beginners to improve core stability and endurance.

data.title: Build Wider Biceps
data.description: An intermediate-level workout focusing on building strength and muscle mass in your biceps. Ideal for those looking to enhance arm size and definition.
